message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to start the conversation with a price of $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of meeting in the middle. How about $160?
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $145.
I'm not willing to go as low as $145, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $160 and $145. How about $152.50?
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $142.50.
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. How about $155?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still think $140 is a fair price for the product.
I've already rejected your previous offer of $140, and I'm not willing to go back to that price. How about we meet in the middle of the last two prices we discussed? That would be $147.50.
I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I can only go up to $139. This is my final offer.
